channel.title: CVE Feed for Red Hat -- virt-install
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Red Hat -- virt-install

item.title: CVE-2019-10183|2024-08-04T22:10:09.993Z -- red%20hat -- virt-install
item.description: Virt-install(1) utility used to provision new virtual machines has introduced an option '--unattended' to create VMs without user interaction. This option accepts guest VM password as command line arguments, thus leaking them to others users on the system via process listing. It was introduced recently in the virt-manager v2.2.0 release.
